title: My first job as a developer
content:
In Russian university, while I was studying electrical engineering I got a chance to work in a different field. 
 I found a job position as a junior computer programmer where I was building the first API programmes in Java and working with database MySQL.

title: Canadian College
content:
Later, I moved to Canada, where I started studying Computer programming at Georgian college.
Here my passion for Java is grown, and also I found a place in my heart for Javascript.

title: My current situation
content:
A few months ago, I graduated from college and currently looking for a job.
 Wish me luck!
 I hope that I will find a job soon in the field which I love.
